title: MORE RP
body: I think that the game doesn't give us free offers for RP. I really want that to happen because RP is quite expensive, ALMOST 10$ FOR AN {{champion:103}}  SKIN!

replies.body: We're getting the hextech crafting system which gives free skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Icarus1314,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AZdUhi3l,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-02-27T12:21:00.341+0000)
>
> what is that O .O??

Pretty much a system where you can trial skins, craft skins and get free champs.

Search up some videos on it, you'll get the basic idea of it.

I agree. I don't believe any company that is wanting to make money would just give away their form of virtual money. But i do believe we really needed something such as the hextech crafting system to allow us to gain skins by playing the game.
so you don't have a job?
